snippet.title: The Ferryman - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Presenting The Ferryman - a new horror game from Brainloaf Studio. Keep your lantern to your chest, lad. These waters aren't as calm as they may seem...

As the Ferryman, it's your duty to deliver goods and supplies to the denizens of the sea. It isn't an easy job, but it needs doing. The Keepers depend on you, so you'd better get to it. Just remember - the further you stray from the shore, the rougher yet the seas become.

Download for free: https://brainloaf.itch.io/the-ferryman

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BrainloafStudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/BrainloafStudio/
Discord server: https://discord.gg/nxjcGnh
